column4: hey i'm unable to access my cd drive does anyone know what the problem might be?
ill play the game, the cdrom isnt powered, turn it on

you do understand the answers you are getting are just as strange to you as your question is to us.  Why do you think its not working? What did you do to test it? Was it seen beofer and it is not now?  Did you install off it?  It is working? Is there a icon on your desktop?
